Sasuga Ayamy sensei. One of the last Rem loyalists, still giving us content after so long.
@Puckzer you’re a braindead idiot

@GirlsundHentai its literally ntr. Come on think your head. Your denying not change anything. Its ntr. And Subaru loves rem actually. So you are wrong. 
And i wil say this again. This is trash Disgusting piece of graphomania. Everyone who liked this are notging more than trash

but damn I'm disappointed, i thought this artist was safe, probably a commission
oh shut up it's ntr, denying it won't change that or your shit taste in anything

"complaint about NTR even though it's literally in the title" Being in the title doesn't make it true. 🤦‍♂️ You can add 'Tsundere' to the tile and that doesn't make Rem a tsundere just because it's in the title.  Some people need to think instead of repeating words they don't understand. I mean come on, Subaru doesn't even try to hide his cringe worthy/stalker obsession with Emilia. He even tells Rem to her face he doesn't feel the same way. If someone doesn't like you, you can not make them jealous or envious by being raped. You can't cheat on someone you're not in a relationship with.

Ram is best girl anyways. Rem is just good for hentai.

This isn't NTR, it's rape. There's a big difference. Netorare is basically just the Japanese slang/word for cheating. ** YOU ABSOLUTELY CAN NOT CHEAT/NTR SOMEONE WHO HAS NO FEELINGS FOR YOU!!** All caps because some people needed to be shouted at to understand something so simple.   You can not invoke the required reaction/feelings of jealously that is the basis of NTR in a one sided love situation.  Not to mention Subaru is such a loser he doesn't even deserve someone as nice as Rem and most people don't even WANT them to be together so you can't NTR the reader either.
Very good! 8/10
Remi with long hair is so hot
Is this the continuation of that wholesome rem hentai? I mean its the same artist...
@Shorupsy They do seem mad, don't they?
@Pucker Imagine getting mad at this kind of stuff lol. I believe there is thing called “sunlight” and also “going outside” that’s worth checking out.
@Bml69420 I left a spoiler warning before talking about arc 7, but I_love_Rem ignored it and talked about what happens anyway so there was no further point in avoiding it.

@NotWxlc Hey dumbass. Just because @RA1L6UN5 assumes I'm an Emilia die hard for fighting with a person who named their hentai account "I_love_Rem" doesn't mean I am one. Not once did I compare Rem to Emilia, so go get your fucking eyes checked. I like Emilia as much as I like any of the other characters, so shitting on only her doesn't bother me. "comment every fucking single Rem doujin" What a moron. This is one of the very few Rem doujins I've even ever commented on shit for brains.
@eatingspaghetti yes
Subaru is a lame character and deserves to be cucked

@Puckzer you fucking mobliatard should have stay quiet, you have serious mental issues to come here and comment every fucking single Rem doujin trying desperatly to protect you fucking poorly ego and trying to proof yourself that moblia is something and downgrade Rem with your fanfics and headcannons but you simply can't because you are a moblia fan and moblia a shit. serious mental help and a bit of webnovel reading is what you really need, and prepare yourself to get you emila stucked in side stories for a few years and some meltdowns on arc 7, take care of your brain until it explodes you schizophrenic annoying weirdo.
Love page 21.

I get where that dude who hates Rem comes from, mainly just think the anime down played her Yandere side even in the mansion were she'd watch the guy sleep everyday and even had to hold herself back from raping him cause "Subaru-Kun is so evil, looking so cute like that~" and even later on offering to be his 2nd wife and convince Emilia if she doesn't agree to it outright, but the arc 7 spoilers was a big dick move, also just wanna state this, Rems cool, I like her crctr, just wish the anime didn't shorten the torture and showed her crazy side more insted of making her a pure wifu
Just an FYI that some lonely ugly fatass that hasn’t seen sunlight in years dropped a spoiler for ARC 7 if you haven't read it yet.
Bruh the salt. I can't get enough of it lmao

@Puckzer that’s because she doesn’t have any of her memories and she’s in the middle of nowhere you braindead idiot. Also psycho stalker? You really took that and ran with it. “This is a girl who will kill you horribly for how you smell” look at you trying to bait people who don’t know what you’re talking about on to your side completely ignoring all the lore. It’s not just any smell it’s the smell of the witch cult your braindead idiot.

@Shadowz97 Rem's just a creepy psycho stalker in the LN and side stories. Do not forget this is a girl who will kill you horribly for how you smell. *spoiler* Since waking up in arc 7, she's just been mostly a bitch anyway. Which is pretty fitting since she's the sister of Ram.
Subaru doesn't deserve Rem anyway.
